notes.text:
This update for jasper fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2018-19542: Fixed a denial of service in jp2_decode (bsc#1117505).
- CVE-2018-19539: Fixed a denial of service in jas_image_readcmpt (bsc#1117511).
- CVE-2016-9396: Fixed a denial of service in jpc_cox_getcompparms (bsc#1010783).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: The JPC_NOMINALGAIN function in jpc/jpc_t1cod.c in JasPer through 2.0.12 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (JPC_COX_RFT assertion failure) via unspecified vectors.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: An issue was discovered in JasPer 2.0.14. There is an access violation in the function jas_image_readcmpt in libjasper/base/jas_image.c, leading to a denial of service.

notes.text: An issue was discovered in JasPer 2.0.14. There is a NULL pointer dereference in the function jp2_decode in libjasper/jp2/jp2_dec.c, leading to a denial of service.
